subject: Shipping ordernumber SSN5753
description_text:
Dear Miss/mr,

I placed an order this Sunday, it still hasnâ€™t been shipped. When will it be shipped? On the site it says between 1-2 days. This also because I paid for express shipping. Ordernumber: SSN5753

KIND REGARDS,

ARD VAN VOORDEN 
Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Ard van Voorden,    We apologize for the delay. The shipment is expected to arrive at our German warehouse on the 12th, at which time we will be able to ship your order.
